duties_responsibilities.duty: Centralize and generate enterprise-wide company intelligence reporting.
Create presentations for senior leadership in support of sponsor engagement.
Facilitate delivery of vendor offering through monthly and quarterly business review content.
Coordinate events to strengthen relationships with strategic partners.
Keep a pulse on the market by monitoring industry news and developments.
Support internal stakeholder/constituent meetings and overall communication strategy.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
